ComicInfo.Summary:
ODYSSEY
New story arc starts here!
The Legacy has been passed on. The Age of Camelot has come and gone. Skye Mathers' Odyssey begins her!
The Realms of Power are in chaos after the fallout from the Age of Camelot. Now, truly alone for the first time in her life, Skye Mathers must figure out a way to save her mentor, Shang, and still fulfill her role as Guardian, protecting the Nexus from old and new threats. Teaming with new allies, she will face her biggest test yet as she goes on an Odyssey to restore the balance to the Grimm Universe!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Canaan White & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Edgar Salazar & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | VIP Platinum Exclusive Variant Cover | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | San Diego Comic Con Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Unlisted | Missing | G | San Diego Comic Con Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Unlisted | Missing | H | San Diego Comic Con ZenBox Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Unlisted | Missing | I | San Diego Comic Con Cosplay Exclusive Foil Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Unlisted | Missing | J | VIP 2019 Comic Fest Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Eric Basaldua (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | K | VIP 2019 Comic Fest Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | L | Subscription Plus Level Exclusive Foil Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Eric Basaldua | Missing |
